title: Crypto Options Traders Are Still Shorting Bitcoin Volatility
description: "Given the absence of big news in August, selling volatility and taking a vacation for solid theta gains is the only thing I can do right now," one trader said. Crypto traders typically short volatility by selling or writing call/put options.
